channel.title: Change Time in Lavos Village
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Change Time in Lavos Village" - Join us in 65,000,000 B.C.

item.title: Change Time in Lavos Village
item.content:encoded:
Sitting at the End of Time you realize Hope is not lost, something can be done, you board on Epoch and leave on an adventure.

Your travel through Times set you back in 65,000,000 B.C.

As you walk in the nearest village, and head toward the town hall, a Red-headed ninja walks toward you and shouts:

"You in the Orange Jump Suit! Yes You! Sit Down Now!"
"Make yourselves at home, the pterodactyl stew is getting out of the oven and will be served soon with warm stegosaurus milk. By the way, I am GORIUM, and I'm glad you're here today!"

As you sit down and embrace the moment, a member of the Village Council comes to you and invites you: http://s1.zetaboards.com/Lavos_Village/.

"Let's get ready for the Day of Lavos."

Your decision will change Times.

gorium
Member of the Village Council in Lavos Village
